mapper.insert: insert into nb_schedule_job ( jobid, customercode, jobname, jobgroup, jobstatus, cronexpression, description, beanclass, isconcurrent, springid, methodname, executordate, createtime, updatetime ) values ( #{jobid}, #{customercode}, #{jobname}, #{jobgroup}, #{jobstatus}, #{cronexpression}, #{description}, #{beanclass}, #{isconcurrent}, #{springid}, #{methodname}, #{executordate}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime} )

insert into nb_schedule_job
jobid,
customercode,
createtime,
updatetime,
jobname,
jobgroup,
jobstatus,
cronexpression,
description,

executordate,

mapper.update:
update nb_schedule_job
createtime = #{createtime},
updatetime = #{updatetime},
jobname = #{jobname},
jobgroup = #{jobgroup},
jobstatus = #{jobstatus},
cronexpression = #{cronexpression},
description = #{description},
beanclass = #{beanclass},
isconcurrent = #{isconcurrent},
springid = #{springid},
methodname = #{methodname},
executordate = #{executordate},
where jobid = #{jobid}

update nb_schedule_job set createtime = #{createtime}, updatetime = #{updatetime}, jobname = #{jobname}, jobgroup = #{jobgroup}, jobstatus = #{jobstatus}, cronexpression = #{cronexpression}, description = #{description}, beanclass = #{beanclass}, isconcurrent = #{isconcurrent}, springid = #{springid}, methodname = #{methodname}, executordate = #{executordate} where jobid = #{jobid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from nb_schedule_job job where job.jobname = #{jobname} and customercode = #{customercode}
